name: _Active
description: A commissioned object has just been introduced into the supply chain.

name: _Container_Closed
description: Object has been loaded onto a container

name: _Destroyed
description: Object has been fully rendered non-usable.

name: _Encoded
description: An instance-level identifier has been written to a bar code or RFID tag

name: _Inactive
description: Decommissioned object that may be reintroduced to the supply chain.

name: _In_Progress
description: Default disposition for object proceeding through points in the supply chain.

name: _In_Transit
description: Object being shipped between two trading partners.

name: _Expired
description: Object is past expiration date.

name: _Damaged
description: Object is impaired in its usefulness and/or reduced in value due to a defect.

name: _Disposed
description: Object has been returned for disposal.

name: _No_Pedigree_Match
description: In validating the pedigree for the object

name: _Non_Sellable_Other
description: Object cannot be sold to a customer.

name: _Recalled
description: Object is non-sellable because of public safety reasons.

name: _Reserved
description: Instance-level identifier has been allocated for a third party.

name: _Returned
description: Object has been sent back for various reasons. It may or may not be sellable.

name: _Sellable_Accessible
description: Product can be sold as is and customer can access product for purchase.

name: _Sellable_Not_Accessible
description: Product can be sold as is

name: _Retail_Sold
description: Product has been purchased by a customer.

name: _Stolen
description: An object has been taken without permission or right.

name: _Unknown
description: An objectâ€™s condition is not known.
